cause.description:
Rex Foundation, founded by the Grateful Dead, provides grants to grassroots programs working to support the arts, cultural survival, a sustainable environment, education and economic & social justice.
1. Arts and culture make life better.
2. A sustainable environment makes life better.
3. Grassroots organizations are the best means to right society's wrongs and make a better world.
cause.mission: work toward a just world that appreciates its arts and culture through grassroots groups
cause.name: Rex Foundation
